headline: Building Job driven Virtual Tech University for India √∞¬ü¬á¬Æ√∞¬ü¬á¬≥
description:
We are building live teaching infrastructure that enables handful of top educators (from Google, Facebook, etc) to coach a large number of students.
We train college students in a year-long live cohorts and they pay us a portion of their salary as fees once they get a tech job (Income Sharing Agreement)

founders.name: Swapnil Daga, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder at AlgoUniversity (S21)

I previously worked as an SRE intern at Google, and as an SWE at Apple after graduating from university. I have an extensive teaching experience and have previously taught in other edtech startups as lead instructor for over 2 years, with my students bagging offers from Google, Microsoft, Bytedance etc. I look after scaling the teaching infrastructure at AlgoUniversity.

A Weekend Oriented Program exclusive for engineers with 0-4 years of work experience designed by the Alumni of IIIT-Hyderabad & IIT-Bombay who have previously worked in Google, Apple, Microsoft, Uber & Tower Research. 
Batch of 50 students

##  If you can Dream, We can make it Reality. 
# Weekend Oriented Program
![class](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9809/9809641.png)
### Missed a Class?
Every live session is recorded, you can watch recordings later with TAs available to solve your doubts.
![weekend](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/6195/6195835.png)
### Busy on Weekdays?
We have designed a weekend-first curriculum to help you make a switch.
![class](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/4616/4616734.png)
### Facing Consistency Issue?
Light-weight weekly exercises, programming labs & 1:1 mentorship sessions, we have it all to help you.
![code-book](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/2232/2232761.png)
### Want to Revise?
Access assignments/notes lifelong and recordings for 21 months. Lifelong access to AlgoU community and [TheJobOverflow](http://algouniversity.com/<https:/www.thejoboverflow.com/>)
![coding](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/1006/1006363.png)
### Never solved DSA problem?
Additional super-light weight learning modules for extreme beginners, helping them to catch-up with the batch.
# One Stop Solution
Curriculum Classes Placements Mentors
### Data Structures & Algorithms
A total of 60-70% of the interview process is solely driven and headed by DSA. Master your DSA preparation with a precise and curated curriculum by our Founders. 
[Detailed Curriculum](http://algouniversity.com/<#>)
### Projects & Externship
Build Industry Oriented Projects using latest tech stacks under the mentorship of Senior Engineers from top Product Based Companies with Externship Certificate in PBC. 
### Dedicated Placement Cell
Optimise your resume, practise mock-interviews and apply using our dedicated Recruiting team. Get access to 1000+ interview experiences at [TheJobOverflow](http://algouniversity.com/<https:/www.thejoboverflow.com/>)
### Flexible Classes
Live classes with flexible timing at evening to accomodate for working professionals. Class recording and reading material avaible if you miss some class. 
### Topic-wise Assignment
Comprehensive assignment designed for indepth coverage of each class, designed by software engineers from top product companies. 
### Doubts & Discussion
TAs available for discussion over text/call and open doubt classes planned for each assignment. 
### Instant Referrals
Get referred to a load of product based companies through our alumini network. 
### Job Postings
Get instant job postings matching your profile, through our company partners. 
### Mock Interviews
Regular mock interview from industry mentors to get you ready for the big interview day. 
### Personalised Mentorship
Get assigned a personal mentor who has made it into top tech company like Google, Apple etc. to help you guide through your journey. 
### Life Coach & Buddy
Get help from resume feedback, to planning your schedule, to guidance on how can you excel in a particular tech stack. Personalised mentors are selected based on your profile to help you leverage the maximum benefit. 
### Top Background
All our mentors are leaders in their domanin and come from top companies. We conduct regular workshops to maximise the bond in mentor mentee relation.

# The Testimonials
Mentors at AlgoUniversity helped me in covering topics ranging from Data Structures, Algorithms, Computer Networks and System design which are asked in technical Interviews. Their elegant approach to write concise and easily understandable code enhanced my coding practices. I got placed during initial days of campus placement and also got an International offer from Shopee, Singapore. 
![Yash Goyal](https://res.cloudinary.com/anchal-gupta/image/upload/v1739195366/algou/yash_goyal_s6j4dj.jpg)
### Yash Goyal
Shopee Singapore
In my third year, I tried preparing for Internship on my own but unfortunately didn't get one. So when I came in my 4th year, I decided to ask Manas for his help in my preparation. One big difference I started to observe now was that when I was stuck at a problem, I would not google the results but rather he would give me some sequential hints which would help me think of solutions on my own. This enhanced my problem solving skills and eventually I got a job as a Software Developer in Plivo Communications. 
![Nalin Abrol](https://d1lrk9cp1c3gxw.cloudfront.net/static/newlanding/profile/nalin.jpeg)
### Nalin Abrol
Plivo
The first interview is always the hardest for anyone. At algo university, I had the option to attend multiple mock interviews. When I was able to excel in one of the mock interviews then I got the confidence to do it again and again. Swapnil sir believed in me and Manas sir pushed me to dream bigger and to be persistent in my vision. Even without any prior internship experience, I bagged an International offer from Tiktok, Singapore. All thanks to my mentors at Algo University. 
![Naman Jain](https://i.ibb.co/BG8Xm9Y/Clipboard.jpg)
### Naman Jain
Tiktok Singapore
When companies started to visit our campus for Internship opportunities, I didn't get any offers so I felt disheartened about it. I talked to Manas and he helped me prepare for Interview by practicing questions designed for me to improve my coding and also making me think like an Interviewer. So when I appeared for Interview for Microsoft, I was well prepared and aced the interview and got a Data Science Internship. 
![Nikita Agarwal](https://d1lrk9cp1c3gxw.cloudfront.net/static/newlanding/profile/nikita.png)
### Nikita Agarwal
Microsoft
Having very little time to prepare for Interview, I found AlgoUniversity's material very helpful. Not only till the interviews but also after completing the interviews, the guidance and long personal discussions I have had when I was deciding between different offers like Codenation, Amazon, Flipkart were really helpful and invaluable. 
![Anjan M](https://res.cloudinary.com/anchal-gupta/image/upload/v1739195582/algou/anjan_mclfzr.jpg)
### Anjan M
Amazon
I hadn't prepared for Interviews prior to companies visiting our college. After seeing my friends getting selected for Internship in top companies, I started to panic. My friends suggested to me that Manas can help me. Being from an electronics background, I had little knowledge in coding so he helped me in learning coding from scratch and also how to face an interview. Thanks to him, I landed an internship in Walmart Labs. 
![Aayush Tiwari](https://res.cloudinary.com/anchal-gupta/image/upload/v1739195041/algou/aayush_tiwari_buf1bj.jpg)

# Our Alumini Got Offers From
Dreaming big is the first step to achieving big. Professional job is going to be a large part of where you spend your time, so it better be your dream place that you would love being at. We have seen ample of students who ended up dreaming big with us and making it a reality working in some of the world's best places. You can too!

Have more questions? Contact us at [ ![WhatsApp](https://d1lrk9cp1c3gxw.cloudfront.net/static/leap/images/whatsapp.png)+91 9515409221 ](http://algouniversity.com/<https:/wa.me/919515409221>)

### Who is eligible for this course?
Software engineers with any number of years of experience can choose to join the course.
### How will my doubts get resolved?
We have Teaching Assistants that would solve your doubts in prompt-manner. These doubts could be related to the class content, regarding the assignments or software development in general.
### How will the placement cell help me get a job?
We have a dedicated team of peers from the Best Business Schools to introduce you to the best opportunities in the industry through tie-ups & Employee Referrals.
### What will be the frequency of 1 on 1 with Mentors?
You will be having 1 on 1 sessions with your mentors every 15 days.
### What is the role of the mentor?
Mentors provide personalized advice on your career. They also help you with mock interviews, help with your resume and provide career advice. Mentors do 1:1 video calls with you for 30-60 mins for each session. It is advisable to do 2 mentor sessions every month.
### What are the pre-requisites for the bootcamp?
There is no restriction, if you are an industry professional and looking to switch to the right position you are eligible.
### What is the duration of the bootcamp?
Depending on which section you opt for, the duration of the course could range from 24 weeks to 32 weeks. This translates to 6 months to 8 months.
### When will the placement start?
Placements will start after 6 months from the start of the bootcamp, i.e. during the last 4 weeks of the bootcamp.
### How can I apply?
Fill out the [registration form](http://algouniversity.com/<#>) and get a call from us.

# FAQs

### Who is eligible for this course?
Software engineers with any number of years of experience can choose to join the course.
### How will my doubts get resolved?
We have Teaching Assistants that would solve your doubts in prompt-manner. These doubts could be related to the class content, regarding the assignments or software development in general.
### How will the placement cell help me get a job?
We have a dedicated team of peers from the Best Business Schools to introduce you to the best opportunities in the industry through tie-ups & Employee Referrals.
### What will be the frequency of 1 on 1 with Mentors?
You will be having 1 on 1 sessions with your mentors every 15 days.
### What is the role of the mentor?
Mentors provide personalized advice on your career. They also help you with mock interviews, help with your resume and provide career advice. Mentors do 1:1 video calls with you for 30-60 mins for each session. It is advisable to do 2 mentor sessions every month.
### What are the pre-requisites for the bootcamp?
There is no restriction, if you are an industry professional and looking to switch to the right position you are eligible.
### What is the duration of the bootcamp?
Depending on which section you opt for, the duration of the course could range from 24 weeks to 32 weeks. This translates to 6 months to 8 months.
### When will the placement start?
Placements will start after 6 months from the start of the bootcamp, i.e. during the last 4 weeks of the bootcamp.
### How can I apply?
Fill out the registration form‚ü®5‚ü© and get a call from us.

**AlgoUniversity - A Fresh Take on Tech Education in India**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, AlgoUniversity is on a mission to build a job-driven virtual tech university dedicated to the aspirations of Indian students. With a base in Hyderabad, this innovative edtech startup aims to address the skills gap in the tech industry through a unique model of education and mentorship.

### **The Model**

At its core, AlgoUniversity combines rigorous live instruction from top-tier educators‚Äîmany of whom hail from giants like Google and Facebook‚Äîwith a real-world approach to learning. Students engage in year-long cohorts, and they only begin to pay for their education once they secure a job in the tech field, a model known as the Income Sharing Agreement (ISA). 

### **What They Offer**

- **Hands-On Learning:** The curriculum focuses heavily on Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), which are crucial for tech interviews, making up about 60-70% of the interview process. Students also undertake industry-oriented projects under the guidance of experienced mentors.
  
- **Placement Success:** The results speak volumes‚Äîover 1,380 students have been trained and placed, with the highest CTC reaching ‚Çπ41 LPA and an average hike of about 110% on their previous salaries.

- **Special Programs:** Their weekend-oriented "Leap Batch" is catered to working professionals, designed by alumni of IIIT-Hyderabad and IIT-Bombay. This program emphasizes quick doubt resolution, externship certificates, and job placements that can begin just three months after starting.

### **The Team**

AlgoUniversity boasts a small, agile team of just 10 employees‚Äîmany of whom are ACM ICPC finalists and engineers from leading tech companies. The founders and mentors are not only educators but also seasoned professionals who understand the demands of the tech industry inside out.

### **Proven Impact**

Students like Mayank Verma and Pallavi Sahu have shared their transformative experiences, highlighting how the curriculum and mentorship at AlgoUniversity enabled them to transition from non-tech jobs to lucrative software engineering positions. The testimonials are filled with stories of impressive salary hikes, international offers, and successful career switches.

### **Financing Your Education**

Their fee structure is straightforward: an initial ‚Çπ5,000 enrollment fee (refundable within 21 days) and subsequent payments of ‚Çπ5,000 per month for six months. Once employed, students pay an additional ‚Çπ40,000 in easy installments‚Äîmaking it a low-risk investment for those eager to enter the tech workforce.

### **Join the Movement**

With a clear focus on meeting the staffing needs of the thriving tech industry in India, AlgoUniversity is not just a place for lectures but a stepping stone to a successful career in technology. As they say, if you can dream it, they can help you achieve it. Check out their website at [algouniversity.com](http://algouniversity.com) and take the first step toward transforming your career in tech.
